name: Burrow (itch) (frnknstn)
description:
Help Magic Mole dig for enough food to last winter.

Run at 1680x945 or 1920x1080 fullscreen for best results.

Controls:

* Click mouse to move

* Space to drop food

* Tab to place storage room

Game made for Ludum Dare 48.

Source code available in bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/frnknstn/burrow-ld48/
